information.name: quickbooks-online
information.description: This plugin exports payments and invoices to QuickBooks Online
information.author: Ubiquiti Networks, Inc.

configuration.label: Client ID
configuration.description: Client ID obtained from your Intuit developer account.

configuration.label: Client Secret
configuration.description: Client Secret obtained from your Intuit developer account.

configuration.label: Account type (Development|Production)
configuration.description: If you use “Development Keys”, use “Development” here. Otherwise, use “Production”

configuration.label: Item Name Format String
configuration.description: Optional format string to generate QB item names derived from UCRM item type.

configuration.label: Date to start for Invoice export
Date to start for Payment export
